ygData.subject: Not the momma
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine takes the shots in the wolfs stomach. the piecing causing mech fluid to begin to leak. He transformed to robot wrapping one arm around Slayers neck

Lunarpine takes the shots in the wolfs stomach. the piecing causing mech
fluid to begin to leak. He transformed to robot wrapping one arm around
Slayers neck he punches him in the back of the head trying to alter the
course of flight and force him to the ground. "Land ya slagging Omega" (The
Omega is the lowest wolf in the pack)  he punched again using his new
strength to take the former maximal to where the real fight can begin.

Magnus called for an end to the fighting but under the circumstances he
couldn't stop. If he stopped he'd have to let go, and if he let go the fall
would be a doosy. He was still learning about his new abilities and didn't
want to find out how well he could take a fall from this hight.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 22, 2000 2:01 PM
Subject: DIE QWEST DIE!!!!


 > ::Ramulus/Slayer/Smokescreen/Proto::
>
> Seeing bots fly toward the Ark, and his scanners reporting that they were
> Predacons, Proto opens fire, aiming at Destructor with one gun and
Cerebrus
> with the other.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus swears, watching bot after bot aproach the Ark, and Proto open
fire.
> He'd have to talk to the bot about opening fire like that, if they
survived
> this that is.
>
> Aiming carefully, he fires a few shots at Destructor.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing Ramulus and Proto open fire, Smokescreen follows suit, firing on
> Destructor.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Slayer growls as Lunarping tackles him, Slayer's jetpack doubling its
power
> and sending the two bots flying up into the air, Slayer firing two shots
from
> his shoulders at point-blank range.
>
>
>
>
